Phoenix Feather...not found in Volcano?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Phoenix Feather...not found in Volcano?
By Loserpie on Wednesday, February 16, 2011 - 07:15 am:

I had a brief search through the topics, but I wasn't terribly thorough, so I apologise if this has been discussed before!

I took my Worm/Pixie on the Kawrea expiditon (after the volcano had exploded in a previous visit). I first visited the Burnt Alter and found the Joker Mask and cleaned it out. I then visited the volcano, and found the God's Slate, but no Phoenix Feather. Having well over 250 life, I decided to explore the top right magma tower...thing. And I found the phoenix feather in it.

Has this ever happened to anyone else? I should probably note that I'm using an emulator, but that shouldn't affect where you find the phoenix feather, right? Or was I mistaken in thinking you can only find it from the Volcano shrine thing?

By Elf* on Wednesday, February 16, 2011 - 09:16 am:

It's definitely up for grabs in the second expedition, I've found it there before myself. I know the
maps for expeditions on here don't seem to work, or at least not for me, but if you see
gamefaqs.com/ps/197977-monster-rancher-2/faqs/41786 (which was done using information from this site)
then you can see it was already known about.

By Loserpie on Wednesday, February 16, 2011 - 03:32 pm:

Ohhh, I knew it was around before haha. I just thought you could only nab it from the middle-volcano building :P made me think other items might be discovered in other buildings?
